tutorial_house.transcript:
Build yourself a house!
A house requires a roof, body and a door.

inventory.name: roof
inventory.description: A roof to cover your house

inventory.name: row
inventory.description: Your house needs floors! use this to add one to your house

inventory.name: window
inventory.description: Nobody wants a dark house! let's get some sun in there

inventory.name: door
inventory.description: Give visitors a warm welcome when they walk in through one of these

inventory.name: floor
inventory.description: A good foundation for your house

hints: Every house requires a base, body, and roof.
Try adding in decorations. Try the class 'window'!
